queries.name: Get Episode by ID
queries.query: query ($id: Int!) { Episodes(info: null, results: [{ id: $id }]) { id, title } }

queries.name: Create New Episode
queries.query: mutation ($input: InfoInput! = {}) { createEpisode(input: $input) { info, results { id, title } } }

queries.name: Update Existing Episode
queries.query: mutation ($id: Int!, $title: String!) { updateEpisode(id: $id, input: { title: $title }) { info, results { id, title } } }

queries.name: Nested Query: Get All Episodes with Filtered Results
queries.query: query ($filter: String!) { Episodes(filter: $filter) { info, results { id, title } } }

queries.name: Optional Parameter: Get Episode by ID (optional)
queries.query: query ($id: Int = 1) { Episodes(info: null, results: [{ id: $id }]) { id, title } }
